title: What is the meaning of the text "La Logica del Sottosuolo" and how does it relate to high magic and purification?
first_phrase: This text discusses the experience of reaching the threshold of "mental emptiness" and struggling to maintain focus, as attention turns inward. Despite the fog of drowsiness and distractions, one fights to hold steady without support or contact, in the spirit of energetic simplicity. As one walks inward, they purify, exorcize, and consecrate. In this process, one gains the ability to act on those who are led by the logic of their own thoughts and spontaneity. The final 200 tokens explore a state of purity and isolation, where a magical circle of light surrounds the individual at night. This section draws on insights from MALINSKY and DE PONCINS' book, La guerre occult.

E a notte alta, infine, e ad occhio tutto aperto, vi è isola mento, vi è sole, vi è purità. Correrà intorno a te, a sua volta, ora, un cerchio magico di luce. Oppure — altro segnacolo di via: sospetta del pia cere. Te ne fu già detto, del resto: « Il piacere abituale * degli uomini ha determinate leggi e determinate fina * liti, è spesso esca affinché siano compiuti determinati atti * nei quali l'uomo è giuocato dalla " natura " e sempre * piú avvinto dalla rete dei fini di questa.
last_phrase: In conclusion, be cautious of the pleasures that lead to non-knowledge and enslavement to nature's impulses. As recommended by Evola in "The Logic of the Inferno," strive for purification and illuminating your inner self to gain true freedom and clarity, as opposed to being subject to the superficiality of others' thoughts and emotions. Cfr. MALINSKY e DE PONCINS, La guerre occulte, Paris, 1935, translated into Italian, provides even more insight into this subject beyond modern psychology and psychoanalysis.
